answerList: In the program on top, Thymio stops when all of his sensors detect something. In the program below, Thymio stops when any of his sensors detect something.
In the program on top, Thymio stops when any of his sensors detect something. In the program below, Thymio stops when all of his sensors detect something.
In the program on top, Thymio stops when none of his sensors detect anything. In the program below, Thymio stops when any of his sensors detect nothing.
In the program on top, Thymio stops when any of his sensors detect nothing. In the program below, Thymio stops when none of his sensors detect anything.
The program on top will not work. Only the one below works.
